about_the_game:
"Why hasn't anyone made a game like this before? We don't know, but we're really happy to bring this experience to you..."

Memorable Moments, that's what we hope to provide for Opposyte players. Have fun with friends in quick matches or add a little excitement to the experience by participating in ranked and championships.



DEVELOPMENT STAGE

This page is dedicated to OPPOSYTE original game, which is in the early stages of development and will use the OPPOSYTE System for Combat Racing Games, the system, with patent deposited, it already has a functional operational version as an Island within Fortnite where the main mechanics of the system can be seen and played by anyone who is curious.

WHAT IS THE OPPOSYTE GAME




Where did the idea come from?

“When I started showing the idea to colleagues, they asked where did I come up with this? I never knew how to answer how the idea entered my head, but in a kind of crazy dream the gameplay mechanic just appeared and when I woke up I thought... oops... we have something here... Since the idea was something I had never seen seen before and although innovative, it was something relatively simple, I went to research if there was any gaming using that and... NOTHING, so one thing led to another" (Will Emmerich)

WHAT TO EXPECT FROM OUR ORIGINAL GAME

We will use the Opposite System for Combat Race games as we did in Fortnite, where we managed to include the base mechanics, however, with our own project we will be able to go much further and include a series of new systems and mechanics.

The main formation of the game in Classic Mode will also be in TRIOs, with teams of 3 players through the matchmaking system, although we also have other Game Modes if you want to go SOLO.





NEW FEATURES

- Characters with different attributes and stats so you can choose the one that best suits your gameplay style, be it running to avoid enemies or clashing to prevent them from completing their laps.

- Each character will have native skills, in addition to the dynamic slot that will change according to the random loot system along the track.

- Many possibilities to customize your character, mainly aesthetic resources and character skins.

- Play Natively by APP on your Mobile without Cloud Streaming with a game design made for this purpose. Crossplatform with PC and consoles.

- Gameplay completely different from the Fortnite prototype, new camera, original characters, collectibles system with comics and much more.

short_description: Have you ever imagined a race between teams starting from the same point, but with OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS? The encounter is inevitable. Survive your enemies, complete laps and score points for your team or strive to disrupt your opponents race. Choose the best strategy for your team.
